trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_SEQ_00<tab>Xeerol Ja seeks an artisan well versed in creative concoctions.

TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_SEQ_01<tab>The coffers of Xeerol Ja Juicecraft are as juicy as a shriveled raisin, and the eponymous proprietor needs your help to reverse her fortunes. Make your way to Bayside Bevy and introduce yourself to the third member of the team: a gatherer named Halnaruk.

TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_SEQ_02<tab>You meet the rather reticent Moblin and officially commit yourself to making healthy and flavorful juices for the people of Tuliyollal. Time to head back to Wachumeqimeqi and get to work.

TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_SEQ_03<tab>Xeerol Ja reiterates her heartfelt thanks for your assistance in this collaborative endeavor. The blend of earnestness, reluctance, and eager anticipation amongst your group already promises a journey through the world of juice as you've never experienced before...
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Halnaruk.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Xeerol Ja.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_000<tab>Might you be <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the artisan from Eorzea? My name is Xeerol Ja, and this is my shop!

TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_001<tab>I'm told that you are meticulous when it comes to mixing a variety of concoctions, and to be frank, I am <var 1A 02 /var>desperate<var 1A 01 /var> for one of your expertise.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_003<tab>Juice is the drink of choice here in Tuliyollal, but as I'm sure you've heard from Ropli, business is bad.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_005<tab>It wasn't always so─when I first opened my shop, profits were steady and customers were eager for the fresh, local juice I offered.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_006<tab>I thought running this business would be easy. I may not have exceptional culinary talent, but anyone can squeeze a fruit, right?
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_007<tab>But now sales are suffering, and some days I spend more on ingredients than I gain in coin. At this rate, I'll be forced to leave Wachumeqimeqi.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_008<tab>I know my menu is generic─and with so much competition in the city, it's little wonder that my erstwhile regulars have sought more compelling refreshments.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_009<tab>Alas, I lack the skill to make anything but the most basic of juices...
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_010<tab>Which is why I need a talented artisan such as yourself to assist me in creating the drinks I know will save my business!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_012<tab>Wonderful! Now, before I expound upon the particulars, there is one other I have recruited to my cause.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_013<tab>His name is Halnaruk, and he is a proficient gatherer. Once we decide upon new recipes, I plan to have him procure in bulk what ingredients we require.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_014<tab>Why don't we join him in Bayside Bevy and have our first official meeting as a team? You go on ahead─I'll be along once I've closed up shop.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_020<tab>You should find Halnaruk in Bayside Bevy. I'll be along in a moment!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_HALNARUK_000_030<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... What business has a lowlander with Halnaruk?
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_HALNARUK_000_031<tab>Ah, yes, the juicymix project. As a professional stuffseeker, Halnaruk has agreed to do the finding of tastyfresh. What of it?
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_HALNARUK_000_032<tab>Juicekeep wants to trade tongueflaps? The mere thought makes Halnaruk sleepydull. What a pointless busytask...
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_033<tab>Apologies for the wait! Now that the whole team's acquainted, I suppose I'll get straight to the point.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_034<tab>To improve my shop's financial fortunes, I need your help in creating some original juices.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_036<tab>That is to say, juices that promote the health and well-being of each and every Tuliyollal resident!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_037<tab>While fruit is an excellent source of vitamins, the diverse peoples of this city have unique dietary and nutritional needs.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_038<tab>So, using both culinary and alchemical techniques, I plan to offer a variety of refreshments bespoke to citizens of all shapes and sizes.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_039<tab>By developing drinks both delicious and singularly nutritious, my customers are sure to remember why they love Xeerol Ja Juicecraft!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_040<tab>Besides, as uncertain as times are, the people here need something to lift their spirits, and what could be better than a soothing beverage?
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_041<tab>Besides, the people are still reeling from the recent tragedy...and though healthy beverages may not amount to much, they may yet help lift some spirits.

TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_042<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I trust an expert alchemist like yourself will be able to maximize the nutritional content of my drinks with scientific precision, yes?

TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_043<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I trust a professional culinarian like yourself will have no trouble drawing out irresistible flavors from healthy ingredients, yes?
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_A1_000_001<tab>Local juice from local fruits? Sign me up!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_A1_000_002<tab>My services are yours...at a price, of course.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_A1_000_003<tab>Just so long as panaloaf isn't one of the ingredients!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_044<tab>Erm... While I can't speak to your experiences across the salt, rest assured that no fruit of that name grows in Tural!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_045<tab>I look forward to tasting your work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_046<tab>Should you have any questions about our local produce, don't hesitate to ask.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_047<tab>As for you, Halnaruk, your job comes after we've created a viable recipe and know exactly what ingredients we require.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_048<tab>I'm afraid that means you'll have to wait...unless you'd like to participate in recipe creation as well?
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_100_048<tab>Your opinion as a Moblin would be invaluable─and you would, of course, be compensated in addition to your gatherer's fee!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_HALNARUK_000_049<tab>...No. Halnaruk has no deepthoughts on juicymix.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_050<tab>Oh. All right, then...
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_051<tab>I-In any case, let's head back to the shop, shall we? There's work to be done!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_HALNARUK_000_055<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... What?
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_060<tab>I just want to reiterate how deeply grateful I am for your assistance.
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_XEEROLJA_000_061<tab>Together, let us make juice Tuliyollal can be proud of─and profits that will save my shop!
TEXT_KINGLA301_04982_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>You may now undertake deliveries for Xeerol Ja Juicecraft at Wachumeqimeqi. Speak to Xeerol Ja to learn more.
